description:
- Old-Fashioned Knit Hat "A recreation of the hat used to keep warm when carrying out agricultural work in the olden days."
 - Loose Straw Hat "A handmade straw hat. Its brim has been purposely left with a rough finish."
 - Farming Bandana "A fashionable bandana that will keep your hair out of the way while farming."
*You can buy it at any time in the game shop( Fashion Store in Castle St. ) when you purchase it.
name: Farming Hats Set
